summary: A young backpacker gets into some trouble in Africa and stows away on a cargo ship heading to Europe.
cast: Peter Mullan|Daniel Brühl|Luis Tosar|Samuli Edelmann|Gary Lewis|Nikki Amuka-Bird|Ricky Grover|Koen Balcaen|Christopher Fairbank|Carlos Blanco|Lois Soaxe|Jan Willem|Joan Serrats|Pere Eugeni Font|Gonzalo Cunill|Kwaku Ankomah|Mawuli Semevo|Paa Kwesi|Prince Yawson|Jo Jo Mills Robertson|Kofi Asante|Augustus Koomson|Babou Cham|Ely Niang|Sylla Mor|Cheikh Mamadou Ndiongue|Mamadoue Gueye|Fall Sakhewar|Kamal Dini|Lewane Caulley|Mikeson Anthony
title: Cargo
